home.title: The reading facilitator app
home.oms: 8 to 12% of the world population is affected by reading and writing disorders specific according to the WHO, the most famous being dyslexia. Reading is omnipresent in our daily life.
home.oms2: For AlphaB, it is essential to provide concrete help to all people in difficulty.
home.oms3: AlphaB has created a suitable and effective solution for all those who require assistance while reading.
home.dislexique1: Thus, the dyslexic understands only the partial meaning of a word or phrase, but not its overall meaning.
home.dislexique2: The message of a text can escape him totally or partially.
home.dislexique3: As a result, he may have blockages in reading and difficulties in different subjects.
home.dyslexique4: The fundamental faculties (of dyslexics), if they are not repressed or destroyed by parents or the education system, can merge into 2 characteristic traits:
home.dyslexique5: above-average intelligence and exceptional creativity. And from there can emerge the true talent of dyslexia: the gift of excellence.
home.dyslexique7: There is no treatment but support to reduce the incidence of this disorder.
home.dyslexique8: It is imperative to identify the dyslexic child as early as possible. Sometimes, in an informed environment, we can spot the disorder at the end of kindergarten

info.title: Express features
info.texte: A simple tool is accessible to all in order to facilitate the reading and understanding of texts
info.block1Text: Depending on your preferences, the tool adapts to your daily reading needs.
info.block2Text: Use our tool and leave us a comment, we will be happy to post it on our site.
info.block3Text: As part of our privacy policy AlphaB does not collect your data or your texts.
info.block4Text: For children and adults we have simplified the functionality as much as possible.
info.block5Text: Available on mobile as well as on all different media
info.block6Text: A question answer is available to understand the tools if necessary
